description:
You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

This virtual dating experience features:
- 13 romanceable women to meet
- hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- 200 original match-3 Puzzles
- 15 hours of gameplay so get ready for flirting and pics!

Browse hot profiles and start a romance. Each girl you meet unveils a mix of storytelling, visuals and desires, from bishoujo women to anime klutz. Exchange intimate messages and flirty selfies, use cool pick-up lines and ask provocative questions - every choice you make will shape the outcome of your relationships.

Cannot take romance to another level? Solve puzzles and reach your true potential as a pick-up artist! With 200 handcrafted levels and neat mechanics, expect addictive gameplay that goes far beyond basic blast puzzles. 

Uncover the interesting stories behind each waifu, unlock pictures, but be aware, some of these pictures are quite spicy so viewer discretion is advised ;)
name: Eroblast: Waifu Dating Sim
